name: ΓΕΡΟΝΤΑΣ ΠΑΣΤΙΤΣΙΟΣ - ELDER PASTITSIOS
logocaption: The page cover featuring the flag of Greece, Flying Spaghetti Monster as Virgin Mary holding a baby dinosaur, as Jesus, a Christian cross and "Elder Pastitsios" with pastitsio face.
accessdate: October 4, 2012  The page ran for about a year until it was closed down after the arrest of its creator for blasphemy on September 21, 2012. The case, which started as a Facebook flame, reached the Greek Parliament twice and created a strong local as well as international political impact.
